## Feature.(constructor)

Define a new feature by providing: - Unique string identifier - API - Dependencies (optional) - Context (optional)

This instance will be detected by engine when exported as default, as well as being used by `<feature-name>.<environment-name>.env.ts` files to define the environment specific implementations.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(def: FeatureDef<ID, Deps, API, EnvironmentContext>);
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                                                       | Description |
| --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ----------- |
| def       | [FeatureDef](./engine-core.featuredef.md)<!-- -->&lt;ID, Deps, API, EnvironmentContext&gt; |             |

## Example

```
export default new Feature({
  id: 'my-feature',
  api: { ... },
})
```
